title: Spacious 2 Bedroom Apartment -- Private Deck & Gated Parking
description:
2 Bedroom apartment for rent on Girard Avenue. Close proximity to Temple, Penn, and Drexel Universities. Around the corner from Aldi and Wine & Spirits -- among many other local businesses, bars, and restaurants. Easy access to Schuylkill River Trail, Fairmount Park, and I-76.
Unit has 1 bath, a large kitchen with bay windows, a private back deck, and a living room with built-in bookshelves and plenty of natural light. Gated driveway attached to the building.
Unit has central air conditioning, brand-new dishwasher, washer/dryer, grill on back deck, and garbage disposal. Heat/gas and water are included in monthly rent. Tenant is only responsible for electric and internet.
Additional $50 a month for gated driveway parking.

title: Beautiful courtyards, Seasonal Bike Share Program, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: A 4 bed/2.5 bath home with roof deck
description:
Welcome to 545 n 23rd st! A 4 bed/2.5 bath home with roof deck, finished basement, hardwood floors and ornate crown molding throughout. On the main floor of the house is the spacious living room, dining room, kitchen and half bath. The luxury kitchen has ge cafe line stainless steel appliances including a five burner stove, rarely offered soap stone counters, custom cabinetry and a door leading to an oversized rear garden with brick pavers and a tall fence for privacy. The pergola in the garden offers shade and makes the space perfect for entertaining and outdoor dining. All three bedrooms on the 2nd floor have hardwood floors, spacious closets and recessed lighting. There is a full bath on the 2nd floor as well with a jacuzzi tub. The 3rd floor is your primary suite with 2 closets and bathroom where you'll find a high end double vanity with travertine countertop, an abundance of cabinetry, recessed lighting and kohler fixtures and dual shower heads. Pets will be considered on a case by case basis. Small dogs are allowed with additional security deposit. Located in the fairmount neighborhood, just blocks from whole foods market, target, pharmacies, restaurants, fitness studios, several parks (including dog parks and playgrounds), and bus routes 33 & 49. Walk to the barnes, philadelphia art museum, franklin institute, kelly drive, the parkway and more!
545 n 23rd st,

title: Spacious ~2 Bedroom 1 Bath duplex for rent in Philadelphia, PA!
description: Available Early July | Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income with a minimum of 2 years of employment, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history. Welcome to 1805 Wylie St #1! This wonderful 2 bedroom / 1 bathroom duplex is located on the first floor. Enter into the main living space with hardwood floors, a decorative fireplace, radiator heaters & window a/c unit. There is a large window a the front and a ceiling fan for year-round comfort, plus space for different living room and dining room set ups. Continue back to your eat-in kitchen featuring granite countertops, subway tile backsplash, wood cabinetry above & below, and tile flooring. Your bedroom is off the kitchen and offers 2 windows for sunlight, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's a small landing area that can either take you out back to a small patio or to the full bathroom with shower/tub combo and window for natural light. There's access to your private, unfinished basement with in-unit washer & dryer and tons of room for storage. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in lovely Francisville, just steps from Fairmount Avenue with great restaurants, bars, and shopping. You’ll be just steps from Francisville Playground, The Spring Gardens, and Roberto Clemente Park & Recreation Center. Close proximity to Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Girard College, and surrounded by public transportation options. Neighborhood favorite places include Bar Hygge, Thirsty Dice, Cambridge Street Coffee House, Urban Saloon, Bold Coffee Bar, Zorba’s Tavern, Fare, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and/or monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and/or monthly pet rent). Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and a $35/month flat water fee. Text # ‪ ‪ show contact info

title: Rare South Philly Tiny House!
description:
Looking for a 1 bedroom apartment? Why not a house? This unique 2 story house features the size and price of an apartment with the privacy and quiet of your own house.
Amazing location! Very short walk to the Italian Market, East Passyunk Square, south Philly Acme, Ray's Happy Birthday bar, Pat's & Geno's, Benna's Cafe, Gold Star Park, and much more. Easy access to 47 bus line, street parking.
Features: Washer & Dryer, garbage disposal, gas cooking, gas forced air heat, central air, exposed brick & beams, built-in shelving, hardwood floors, coat closet, 2 bedroom closets, bathroom closet.
Drawbacks: Call it 'cozy' if u like, but this place is small!  It is very ample for a single person, even feasible for a couple, but this is not a large house, truly 500 square feet, not including the unfinished basement with W/D.  It is however very nicely laid out with lots of closet space.  There is also basically no yard or outside space.  There is a small alley out the back suitable for storing trash/recycling, which leads to a secure shared breezeway to the street.
Water is included in the rent, tenant pays other utilities.
Sorry no pets. Email for phone.

title: 1805 WYLIE ST # 1
description: Available Early September | Landlord Requirements: Applicants to make a minimum of 3x the monthly rent in verifiable net income with a minimum of 2 years of employment, no landlord filings or evictions within the past 4 years, and must have a verifiable rental history. Welcome to 1805 Wylie St #1! This wonderful 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom apartment is located on the first floor. Enter into the main living space with hardwood floors, a decorative fireplace, radiator heaters & window a/c unit. There is a large window a the front and a ceiling fan for year-round comfort, plus space for different living room and dining room set ups. Continue back to your eat-in kitchen featuring granite countertops, subway tile backsplash, wood cabinetry above & below, and tile flooring. Your bedroom is off the kitchen and offers 2 windows for sunlight, a ceiling fan, and good closet space. There's a small landing area that can either take you out back to a small patio or to the full bathroom with shower/tub combo and window for natural light. There's access to your private, unfinished basement with in-unit washer & dryer and tons of room for storage. Schedule your showing today! About The Neighborhood: Located in lovely Francisville, just steps from Fairmount Avenue with great restaurants, bars, and shopping. You’ll be just steps from Francisville Playground, The Spring Gardens, and Roberto Clemente Park & Recreation Center. Close proximity to Eastern State Penitentiary, The Met Philadelphia, Girard College, and surrounded by public transportation options. Neighborhood favorite places include Bar Hygge, Thirsty Dice, Cambridge Street Coffee House, Urban Saloon, Bold Coffee Bar, Zorba’s Tavern, Fare, and tons more! Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $55 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional fee and/or monthly pet rent, if accepted. (Generally, $500/dog and $250/cat, and/or monthly pet rent). Tenants responsible for: electricity, gas, cable/internet, and a $35/month flat water fee.

title: Charming One Bedroom
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. title: UPENN! Incredible 3 bed 2 bath Fitler Sq home with patio, C/A & more!
description:
515 S. 27th Street
This 4 story Fitler Square Home is a gem in the highly desired Fitler Square neighborhood. Perfectly situated a block away from the Schuylkill (Taney) Park and just at the foot of the South Street bridge leading to UPenn, CHOP, and Drexel. There is not a better location to enjoy all the benefits of Center City, with the accessibility to University City.
The home features an open concept layout, with exposed brick and beams, as well as the ample lighting provided by the overhead skylight which catches your eye as you walk through the front door into the living room. Pass through the dining room as you enter the kitchen which has been completely updated with Stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, maple cabinets, glass /slate backsplash, and a porcelain tile floor with radiant heating below, finished with a convenient granite breakfast bar. Off of the kitchen is a quaint rear outdoor area, ideal for a grilling and relaxing on your patio table. The entire home has been updated with dark hand-scraped maple hardwood floors, custom trim work and neutral yet classic freshly painted walls.
Go up the open staircase to the 2nd floor, which boasts the master bedroom complete with recessed lighting, ceiling fan and his/her California-style closets, as well as an additional storage closet. As well, there is a newly remodeled custom bathroom with enclosed glass shower including porcelain floor and wall tile and stone/glass mosaic accent wall. The exposed brick wall follows you up to the third floor which features another remodeled bathroom with full tub, as well as a bedroom with brick fireplace and a 3rd nice sized bedroom.
Truly unique to this home for this area of the city is the 400+sf finished basement. Use this area as an entertainment area, child’s play room, or office. This room features recessed lighting, wall to wall sculpted carpeting, HDMI hook-up, flatscreen mount, built in entertainment shelving, enclosed laundry area, and ample storage.
Convenient to Rittenhouse Square, UPenn, CHOP, Drexel, Fitler Square park, Taney Park, Graduate Hospital, Philadelphia Airport, and of course all of the restaurants, coffee shops, bars and overall neighborhood feel which makes Fitler Square one of the City’s most desirable neighborhoods.
Due with signing of the lease: First month’s rent, last month’s rent, 1 month security deposit

title: Latona St,  Breezy and bright, this 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom!!!
description: Latona St,  Breezy and bright, this 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom Point Breeze charmer has everything you need and more for convenient and comfortable city-living. With a spacious back patio, expanded and expansive primary suite, and updated kitchens and bathrooms this home is move-in ready.  Tall south-facing windows let in a lot of light. High ceilings and hardwood floors provide an open first floor with multiple possibilities for configuration. A living/dining area towards the front of the home is separated from the spacious galley kitchen by a must-have powder room. The kitchen boasts an extra-tall Liebeherr refrigerator and other stainless steel appliances along with deep cabinets covering three walls of the room.  Between the neutral-colored, freshly painted walls and the turquoise-tiled kitchen backsplash, you can’t help but feel a sense of calm from the second you enter 1825 Latona and as you move through the first level towards the back patio - your own slice of South Philly heaven. Mature rose bushes serve as nature’s beautiful backdrop for your future dinner parties, barbeques, or lazy Sundays sipping your morning coffee.  Up the first flight of stairs you’ll find two bedrooms, a full bathroom, and a hallway linen closet. The sunny back bedroom has four windows, an unusually large amount for a rowhome of its kind, and a spacious mirrored-closet. The front facing bedroom also features a closet, as well as a private nook with a built-in bookcase. Both the separate shower and bathtubs in the hallway bathroom are decorated with blue glass tiles, the vanity has been recently updated, and a bathroom closet offers major appeal.  The third floor is home to the primary en-suite with a bonus room full of possibilities. Originally a back patio, the current owners had decided to enclose the space that is now home to 2 separate built-in shelving areas, a large window providing natural light, and an extraordinary antique pocket door - think additional bedroom, office, nursery, media room, work-out area or meditation space. Transition to the spa-like primary bathroom where you’ll find a large carrara-marble lined shower with a bench for relaxing and adjustable shower heads. A soaking tub with turquoise glass tile accents completes the room. The large bedroom comes with a ceiling fan, walk-in closet, vaulted ceilings, and is large enough to fit a king bed with end tables and more.  A clean and dry basement with front-loading LG laundry machines completes the home - partially finish it or keep it as-is, you pick! Easily stroll into Center City for work or pleasure, hop on the bus or nearby Broad Street subway line or simply stay local - Community Bar, American Sardine Bar, On Point Bistro, and Dock Street Brewery South are all great neighborhood hangouts!
